resources.string: A superhero with incredible strength, speed, and the ability to fly. He fights for truth, justice, and the American way.
A vigilante who uses his wealth and intellect to fight crime in Gotham City. He has no superpowers, but relies on his physical abilities and a range of gadgets.
An Amazonian warrior princess with superhuman strength, speed, and agility. She fights for peace, justice, and equality.
A superhero with the ability to crawl on walls, enhanced strength, and a "spidey-sense" that warns him of danger. He fights to protect New York City from various villains.
A super-soldier with enhanced strength, agility, and endurance. He fights for American values and defends the world against threats to freedom and democracy.

A superhero with the power of superhuman speed, allowing him to move at incredible velocities and react at lightning-fast speeds. He uses his abilities to protect Central City and fight against villains who threaten it.
